purpose: Create an agentic environment that is completely free and open-source for developers and researchers
principle: Builds on open-source principles and community-driven development to replicate the functionality of commercial agentic environments
reusability: Designed as a plug-and-play environment with configurable options for various agentic tasks
limitations: In early alpha stage with potential stability issues and limited documentation
name: MyManus
highlight: Provides a free and open-source alternative to commercial agentic environments like Manus
